subject: Questions
description_text:
Hi guys,

i’m looking into getting myself a set of your simsonn pro x ultra’s. I
would like to order it on your website, but shipping time gives 5-12 days.
If I’m correct you have a germany warehouse, which makes the 5-12 days
seems a bit long. In fact, the local aliexpress seller is written to send
from Germany and takes a lot less time. What’s recommended here, also with
an eye on avoiding customs costs for import of a heavy package from outside
the EU. Because if that’s being added, it’s cheaper to order the higher
prices moza’s or simagic’s.

Second question, is there a possibility to replace the elastomers in the
brake with springs? And if so, what spring sizes and washers do I need?

Thanks in advance

Dave

conversations.body_text: Hi Dave Kleinrensink,  ​   This delivery time is only a reference. Countries closer to Germany will have shorter delivery times, possibly as little as 3 days. Pro X Ultra is in stock in our German warehouse, so shipping from Germany will not incur customs duties.

Great thanks!

And my second question?

Op vr 25 jul 2025 om 10:45 schreef support@simsonn.com
Hi Dave Kleinrensink,    You can buy some springs, but they can only be shipped from China.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/sprung

Super, you guys are great! Is it possible to put all in one order without
having influence on the pedals coming from germany and springs from china,
or do you recommend to make 2 seperate orders?

Gonna order everything today

Op vr 25 jul 2025 om 12:20 schreef support@simsonn.com
Hi Dave Kleinrensink,    You can purchase all products in one order to save on shipping costs.

Thanks for the quick replies, great customer support????

Op vr 25 jul 2025 om 12:30 schreef support@simsonn.com

Order places, thanks dor the help again.

Tip: it would be great if you guys can produce pedal side plates(for
throttle & brake) in the near future. A lot of sim racers want it, but not
many companies sell it. Easy to make but great profit; the ones on Etsy
sell for +/- 20$ now.

Example:
https://images.app.goo.gl/ARPYNjdx1MhEZ8PK7

<https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=bff55ff221f7a59a&rlz=1CDGOYI_enNL676NL676&hl=nl&sxsrf=AE3TifPz46t1NsfRQBJu-2ueRnUAIQlQtg:1753513351557&udm=2&fbs=AIIjpHzUAMFED-r4IWZYq00pNSq9_DLFA4mFB1mvIbRIxNSHKY-oHRwDYpPTKzn2ggRQWfA2w-1o1aNcEJmaDTxUnDZSmuSRx9H03MmVkm5glXkr3KjvdijfApXRIC6DJ9gtGidh_d-P-xqJzqXYAupb36V6p-NxWwHi59m8nLChlzVdd_cpUnzV8A_fvOoGuwY8Noi0EGsmZz5K2FITmFqOuEg0qfqHAQ&q=mercedes+gt3+pedals&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwikuraj-tmOAxXnm_0HHeXzBXUQtKgLegQIEBAB&biw=390&bih=669&dpr=3#>
<https://share.google/doZUH4yQybU71fVdY>
Etsy example:
https://www.etsy.com/de-en/listing/1735396841/simagic-p1000-pedal-side-supports?ref=elp_anchor_listing&sts=1


Cheers guys
